categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Raze was a female Sith Lord who lived during the Old Republic era. By herself, she rescued a Mandalorian clan from a battalion of twenty Jedi on Dantooine. The clan were so moved by her skill and fearlessness that they broke tradition and honored her as a fallen sister, becoming the first outsider to receive a Mandalorian death ceremony known as kote ky'ram.
